actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the benefit reductions which are presently required in the case of spouses and surviving spouses who are also receiving certain Government pensions.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the requirement that the amount of monthly benefits payable to a spouse, surviving spouse, or mother be reduced by the amount such spouse, surviving spouse, or mother receives in monthly payments from a Federal or State pension plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the benefit reductions which are presently required in the case of spouses and surviving spouses who are also receiving certain Government pensions.
